00013 #undef main                     // SDL_main.h overrides main()

00015 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00016 {
00017     ScriptManager *scriptManager = ScriptManager::getInstance();
00018     scriptManager->setArguments(argc, argv);
00019 
00020     /* File to execute. */
00021     string fileName;
00022 
00023     if(argc < 2) {
00024         /* Some default. */
00025         fileName = "main.lua";
00026     } else {
00027         fileName = argv[1];
00028     }
00029 
00030         LogManager::getInstance()->message("running lua main file: %s", fileName.c_str()); 
00031 
00032     scriptManager->runScript(fileName);
00033         getchar();
00034                 
00035     return 0;
00036 }
